title: Leagues Tribunal System is a Failure.
body: game after f*cking game from lvl 15 - platinum 5 my team is trash. The amount of pressure and anger that i have held back over the years is unbelievable. 95% of the games consist of me int he jungle at the 15 min being 5-0 while 2 of the other lanes is always 0-5. ( don't even begin talking about " oh well your jungle go gank " no f*cking sh*t) I Never start or induce or catalys or join in or erect an argument how ever you wanna say it. According to my team its always my fault. Why do i get a 14 day ban for saying nothing and for doing well? why not the R*tards that flame and feed? (<--- best way to describe the dipshits on my team)

replies.body:
> Why do i get a 14 day ban for saying nothing and for doing well? 

If you were punished for saying nothing at all, I'd like to take a look at it. Can you please post the chatlog that was presented in your reform card?

> [{quoted}](name=yeulx,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AkMdHHzZ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-05-03T22:40:32.482+0000)
>
> Dooo eit tantram dooo eit... 
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 
> 
> also is it possible to pull out old reports/punnishment things from like ages ago?

The point of most of the Riot engagement in Player Behavior & Moderation isn't to start a witch hunt, but rather to provide clarity and context to the individual questioning the system (and to correct any issues if they exist), and additionally others in the community who might not completely understand how the player behavior systems work.

A real question for me to understand. Why doesn't he send him a privat message where he gives him this info + email address from the support in such a case? To answer this in a public way is always ending up in a witch hunt. Or let's say in 99,5 %.

> [{quoted}](name=CooL Ice Tea,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AkMdHHzZ,comment-id=0003000000000002,timestamp=2016-05-04T06:56:07.756+0000)
>
> A real question for me to understand. Why doesn't he send him a privat message where he gives him this info + email address from the support in such a case? To answer this in a public way is always ending up in a witch hunt. Or let's say in 99,5 %.

The moderators are the only ones who utilize the Boards Notifications system, and this is pretty much exclusively used to give warnings.

nah wuks i was only kidding about it  and yeah thats true   tho i was mostly asking if it was possible to pull up past reports because i personally wanted to see when i was last punished if i eve n was
its also a sport kinda like nascar, we watch for the wrecks.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AkMdHHzZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-03T22:30:28.274+0000)
>
> If you were punished for saying nothing at all, I'd like to take a look at it. Can you please post the chatlog that was presented in your reform card?

Its been nearly 5 hours =I still no chat log. {{summoner:6}} He ran.
For saying nothing? Show the chat logs
maybe you talk shit at the end game post chat then they copy and paste in the report, i do that all the time
Maybe if you weren't so negative you wouldn't lose and get banned so much.. Just a thought..
riot sucks its system sucks and you suck. gg :D{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
System is garbage. Promotes premades to just troll everyone now that the amazing dynamic que is here. Good luck trying to enjoy a game.
